fields.headline: Tickets to ride
fields.bodyText: Six top destinations Sydney: £499 Gulf Airways from Heathrow via Bahrain and Singapore. Must be booked by February 28. Valid for departures until June 30. No minimum stay, maximum six months. All travel must be completed by December 15. Trailfinders (020-7938 3939, trailfinders.com). New York: £270 Kuwait Airways from Heathrow. Valid for departures until March 15, then March 28-June 30. Full payment required when booking. No minimum stay, maximum three months. Airline Network (0870 2349915, airlinenetwork.co.uk). Hong Kong: £369 Cathay Pacific from Heathrow. Must be booked by February 22. Valid for departures April 10-June 17. Minimum stay four days, maximum one month. ebookers (0870 8146024, ebookers.com). Los Angeles: £306 Delta Air Lines from Gatwick via Atlanta. Must be booked by February 28. Valid for departures until March 17. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum one month. Thomas Cook Flights Direct (08701 111111, thomascook.com). Amsterdam: £58.40 BMI from Heathrow. Must be booked online. Valid for departures indefinitely. No minimum stay, maximum one year. BMI (flybmi.com). Paris: £85 British Airways from Birmingham. Must be booked online (£15 supplement if booked by phone). Valid for departures indefinitely. No minimum stay, maximum one year. British Airways (ba.com, 0870 8509850). The pick of the rest Miami: £265 American Airlines from Manchester via Chicago. Valid for departures until February 28. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum one month. Quest Worldwide Travel (0870 4423513, questtravel.com). Cape Town: £399 Qatar Airways from Heathrow via Doha. Valid for departures until March 18. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum two months. Travelmood (08700 664556, travelmood.com). Mexico City: £476 Iberia from Heathrow, Gatwick, Manchester or Birmingham via Madrid. Valid for departures until March 16. Minimum stay six days, maximum three months. Journey Latin America (020-8747 3108, journeylatinamerica.co.uk). Prague: £69 British Airways from Heathrow. Valid for departures until March 31. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum one month. Flight Centre (0870 4990042, flightcentre.co.uk). And the rail alternative Paris, Brussels: £59. Lille: £55 Eurostar from Waterloo or Ashford. Must be booked at least 21 days before departure. No advance booking required for Saturday or Sunday same-day returns or trips including a Saturday-night stay. Eurostar (08705 186186, eurostar.com). NB Fares can change rapidly. These were available in reasonable quantities at the time of writing, but they can sell out in a sudden rush.
